channel.title: CVE Feed for Joel Starnes -- pageMash > Page Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joel Starnes -- pageMash > Page Management

item.title: CVE-2024-31087|2024-08-02T01:46:04.581Z -- joel%20starnes -- pagemash%20%3E%20page%20management
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Joel Starnes pageMash > Page Management allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects pageMash > Page Management: from n/a through 1.3.0.
